form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Latin American Apostolate Archdiocese of New Orleans, 821 General Pershing St., New Orleans, Louisiana 70115

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/6/2023 Latin American Apostclate ARCHDIOCESE OF NEW ORLEANS 821 GENERAL PERSHING ST., NEW ORLEANS, LOUISIANA 70115 (504) 895-0395 Tegucigalpa August 26, 1950 Mr. Aurelio Pena Rodriguez For your information I am transcribing to you the Decree that literally says: Office of Foreign Affairs of the Republic of Honduras. Tegucigalpa D.C.26 of August 1950. Affidavit No. 103. Judgement to resolve the process of naturalzation followed by the Political Government of this city by petition of Mr. Aurelio Pena Rodriguez, of full age, married, constructor and from this Central District, born in Islas Canarias, Spain, on April 5, 1907. WHEREAS: That the petitioner has been residing in Honduras since 1928 more than two years as is required by the naturalization article 11 No. 1 of the constitution and verified that he does not fall under the articles 14 and 15 of the immigration law. Whereas the petitioner Mr. Rodriguez has renounced his Spaniard nationality and has manifested the desire to adopt the Honduran nationality and he has also renounced all submission, obedience and fidelity to another government and especially to his country of origin and all protection, laws and authority foreign to the country of Honduras. Futhermore pledging adhesion and obedience to the law and authorities of Honduras. The President based on the faculties bestow on him by articles 121 No. 23 of the Political Constitution and article 3 No. 9 of the code of administrative procedures resolve: That Mr. Aurelio Pena Rodriguez be granted the naturalization card and that the office of Foreign Affairs enter the information in the Book of Registry for foreigners about the chance of nationality of the above mentioned petitionary Mr. Rodriguez. Let it be known. (signed)Galvez. The Secretary of State in the office of Foreign Affairs(signed) J.E. Valenzuela. Sincerely, Signed and sealed by Alejandro Alfaro Arriaga (Registered in the Archives of the General Office of Population and Migration. Tegucigalpa, April 10,1984) (signed by) Mr. Alfredo Calix Bardales, Head of the Registry Office.) The above was prepared by LATIN AMERICAN APOSTOLATE 821 GEN. PERSHING Dora Zuniga, April 24,1986 NEW 835 0395
